1: I praise gratefully, lifted up and standing strong today.
2: I ask and I receive healing
3: I live and rise, my life renewed and sustained.
4: Grateful remembrance of holiness inspires joyful praise.
5: Each morning brings renewed joy and life.
6: I stand firm in prosperity with steady confidence.
7: By your favor my foundation stands strong and secure.
8: I seek help through heartfelt prayer
9: I live to praise and declare truth
10: I receive compassion and steadfast help now.
11: Gladness clothes the heart, and dancing overflows
12: I express gratitude and celebrate always
